sentences.en: Both total ecological capacity and total ecological footprint showed an increasing trend.
sentences.cn: 总生态承载力和总生态足迹都显现上升趋势.

sentences.en: Can you identify the footprint label ( A - F ) for the forestry component?
sentences.cn: 你能指认它林业元素的足迹标签 ( A -F ) 吗 ?

sentences.en: Firstly, new primary equipment permits a drastic reduction in the footprint area.
sentences.cn: 首先, 新型的一次设备可以大幅减少占地面积.

sentences.en: It has a small footprint on system's CPU, memory and resources.
sentences.cn: 它具有占地面积小系统的CPU, 内存和资源.

sentences.en: New Anatomical Findings Regarding the Footprint of the Rotator Cuff.
sentences.cn: 旋转肌袖覆盖区解剖学上的新发现.

sentences.en: Perhaps the footprint was a hallucination.
Please leave your footprint, let me know you have been here.
sentences.cn: 留下你的足迹, 让我知道你来过.

sentences.en: She was staring at the footprint, full of fear.
sentences.cn: 她盯着脚印, 内心充满了恐惧.

sentences.en: The bank recently inked agreements to expand its China footprint.
sentences.cn: 该行近期签署了扩大在华业务的协议.

sentences.en: The computer had a desktop footprint of 10 by 16 inches.
sentences.cn: 那台电脑的屏幕大小是10×16英寸.

sentences.en: The device structure is simple, small footprint, easy to use and reliable.
sentences.cn: 本设备结构简单, 占地面积小, 操作方便,使用可靠.

sentences.en: The human footprint has stomped all over Mother Earth.
sentences.cn: 人类已经完全践踏了地球母亲.

sentences.en: We all need to look for ways to reduce our carbon footprint.
sentences.cn: 我们都需要寻求降低碳排放量的方法。

sentences.en: We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
sentences.cn: 我们追踪雪地里一头鹿的足迹。

sentences.en: We saw no houses, no smoke, no footprint, no boats, no people.
sentences.cn: 我们没看到房子和炊烟, 也没看到足迹 、 船和人.

sentences.en: You are listening to Susan Burns, CEO of the Global Footprint Network.
sentences.cn: 您正在收听对苏珊?彭斯的采访, 她是全球足迹网络的总裁.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指软地上的）脚印，（地板上的）脚印，<商>（建筑物或设备，尤指计算机）占用的空间，<术>（尤指来自卫星的）广播信号覆盖区
trans.tran_en: a mark made by a foot or shoe
